item.title: Apollo Token
item.content:encoded:
PURCHASE
CHART
TOKENOMICS
 
ROADMAP
F.A.Q.
WHITEPAPER
 
 
 
 
 
 

A Moon Mission Like Never Before

 What is $APOLLO?

Launched in May 2021, Apollo is an auto-generating liquidity protocol built on the Binance Smart Chain. There has been an explosion of interest in low market cap cryptocurrencies during the recent market cycle and many of these tokens have no real-world use. $Apollo is an asset with in-built innovative ‘whale proof’ mechanisms, which will rocket you into the stratosphere like Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin! By redistributing 2% of every transaction, $Apollo rewards you for holding long term. To ensure the token’s stability, another 8% is allocated to the liquidity pool permanently.

Okay, but how do I buy some?

  • Go to Metamask.io and download their wallet to your phone or internet browser.

  • Send BNB to your metamask wallet.

  • Go to PancakeSwap.Finance, go to the trade screen on the left, then click “Connect” in the top right of the screen.

  • Click on the select currency screen and enter the $Apollo token contract: 0x67e6779ab8967806244764cdd4597556244971a4

  • Click “settings” on the top right and adjust your slippage to 12%

  • Then swap the amount of BNB that you want into $Apollo!

What We Do

Since 1950, we have led the effort to permanently protect nearly 110 million acres of wilderness. We have been at the forefront of nearly every major public lands victory.

item.title: Tokenomics
item.content:encoded:
The Token

1B Supply

10% Initial Burn

 

15M Max Buyable

10% Transaction Tax

8% LP Locked

2% Redistributed

item.title: FAQ
item.content:encoded:
FAQ

 

Q: Website X says Apollo is a rug.

A: These websites are very primitive and don't understand newer tokens.

In our case, rug screen is adding points to our token because of a requirement inside the transfer function that ensures no holder can buy more than 15 million. We don't understand why this is causing rugscreen to think we're a rugpull, but its provably untrue. The dev has renounced ownership of the contract and all liquidity has been locked forever.

Ownership Renounced

Liquidity Locked Forever

 
 
 

Q: Why can’t I buy more than 15M tokens?

A: As part of our whale proof tokenomics, we have restricted the amount one person can hold to just 15 million tokens, ensuring no one holder can control the market.

 

Q: Why can’t I buy?

A: If the buy would result in you having more than 15M tokens in your wallet, it won’t work. Also, be sure to use PancakeSwap V2 and 11% slippage.

 
 
 
 

Q: Is there any way to get more than 15M tokens?

A: Yes! Through redistribution, you will continue to gain more tokens over time, even if you already have 15M!

 
 

Q: I want to help spread the word of Apollo, what's the best thing I can do to help?

A: The best thing anyone can do to help is to spread the word and tell other potential investors why you love the project!
